ai-anya-e0501n21:3_0: All the condition: not immaterial condition,
ai-anya-e0501n21:3_3: With meaning and non-discrimination: it is one point ;
ai-anya-e0501n21:3_4: Likewise: he is mindful in this way.
ai-anya-e0501n21:3_5: The conclusion of the world when there is no enlightenment factor is finished.
ai-anya-e0501n21:4_0: The exposition of the section on that is finished.
